file_content.text: Um, okay, wide stance... lean in... and--whoa!
Hahaha! Amazing!
Why have I never tried one of these before?
Come on, rotworms! How you like the taste of your own medicine?
Buda-buda-buda-buda-buda-buda-ching!
Hey, you wanna try? Just kidding! Get your own!
We're at capacity. SCORPIO and Senya are on board. What's the situation?
Great... just bug out before anyone notices you buzzing around! We'll take the skyhook back down and meet you at the hideout.
Don't need to tell me twice, you'll probably beat us back to the hideout.
Acknowledged. Looks all clear for the time being.
Just play it cool, my guardian angel will handle anybody taking an unhealthy interest.
Okay, Vette, I'm here.
Just... gimme a sec....
Time's a factor.
Hey, you wanna cut through a foot of cortosis and steel while hanging upside down in a half-meter crawlspace?
There...! Jerk. Try it.
The moment of truth.
You know, I was loaded before you were tracking me down, but it was all zeros on a balance sheet.
I've been rich, filthy rich, but nothing like this. Counting the zeros on a balance sheet can't even compare.
There's just something magical about the real thing.
It's not ours yet.
Focus on the job.
Yet, being the operative word.
I couldn't begin to put a number to all this.
No kidding.
At a certain point, you just stop counting.
Stop drooling and help me set this charge.
Hurry up!
I'll be sure to tell SCORPIO to suck the joy out along with the goods.
It won't look nearly as impressive in a second, but it'll spend all the same.
Do the honors?
For the Alliance, and freedom.
Call this a win.
To lucrative partnerships.
Thanks, I will.
Let's see how much Arcann enjoys this.
I enjoy every shot I can take.
Payload's delivered, it's time for the paydirt.
Door is... open!
Commencing depressurization.
Tank is filling. So far, so good.
It will take approximately ten minutes seventeen seconds to siphon a space of that volume.
Plenty of time to make our exit.
Great, let's blow this joint!
I'm sure we've worn out our welcome.
I second that.
Did you bring that with you?
Where'd that come from, Vette?
This little thing? Nah. I passed the armory and it was just laying around, so I figured nobody'd miss it.
You enjoy doing that, don't you?
You're always popping up.
Maybe a little--a lot--what good is being sneaky if you can't make a great entrance?
It is unlikely the detonation went unnoticed. After we vacate the bridge, I will no longer be able to maintain a complete lockdown.
See, perfectly justified acquisition. Come on, I want to try this thing out!
I really really hope they check for mynocks.
All Personnel. Prepare for testing of emergency lockdown systems and maintain your current stations.
Your route to the vault is open. Though I can ensure no reinforcements will arrive, you will have to dispatch enemy personnel along the way.
I have blocked all internal and external communication, but I detect multiple attempts to bypass security. The crew is growing restless.
We are in position... extending umbilical... seal is tight. All green.
Airlock disengaged. Awaiting order for depressurization.
Hurry it up in there, alright? This flying crate is an easy target.
I hope you're making good time, we'll need as much of a head start as we can get in this thing.
Ah! Stupid-- Go away! Go...! They do not--ah, that hurt--they do not check for mynocks.
Are you sure those schematics were scaled in meters? I can hardly move!
My last partner didn't complain nearly this much.
Your last partner was crushed to death!
And never once complained about it!
Score! Oof--that's heavy.
What's heavy? Are you in the vault?
Oh, no, it's nothing! Nothing! Almost there.
We're keeping them busy on our end, but I don't think we're any closer to reaching you.
Oh, this is bad--this is real bad. Gravestone's sensors are picking up Eternal Fleet ships. A lot of them!
I think we're out of time. The Gravestone's got Eternal Fleet signatures arriving in the system!
Whoa! Okay, that's bad. We've got to get around... this way!
SCORPIO, do you still have any access to the blast doors?
Only through direct input.
Blast! We're getting boxed in! Come on, I think there's one more route we can try.
Just scramble the systems as best you can and leg it to the tanker--we'll see you there.
Okay, I ought to be able to reach the vault mechanism along this route. Keep clearing a path for Gault and I'll see you soon!
Oh, here! Help me with this panel!
